channel.title: [project]Fun Server
channel.description:
New boards regarding the project can be found [url=http://www.ravfeprod.info]here[/url]. I wont be updating this thread much now that I got my domain working.
Just a little side project I'm starting to work on while I'm not drinking at collage. Basically I'm just gonna take easyrsc and change lots of random things and what not to see how much they will appeal with the general rsc public :D Ideas/Constructive Criticism/Comments are always welcome.
[code] To do list: -Class System -Skills and Spells -Enchanting -New landscape -Different weapon types(no more bronze, iron, steel etc) -Professions(like wow)
Completed: Stamina/Mana system. Still requires skills and spells for it though [/code]
Currently working on: Class system
I came up with this today while i was talking about the project with a friend. I guess what I'm gonna do until I can get some of my friends to help with this is, I'll change/add 3 stats(str,def,atk) and name them something like Warrior, Thief , Archer, etc.. and you can do quests to level them up. And the higher the level is, you can get better skills, areas, weapons and armor.
Update: Got mana/stamina system working with some bugs. Got other stuff to worry about though.
Need opinions on which forum software, other than punbb, would be the best to integrate rscdv25 with.
Thats basically all I could think of for now.

item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“ravfe, post:10, topic:357163”][quote author=mapu link=topic=453683.msg3323281#msg3323281 date=1282881524]
Explain your 1 player system man. I’ve discussed a 1 player RSC before.
[/quote]
tbh i dont quite understand what he meant by that, but i suppose what he meant was basically give it all the components of a modern day rpg or something.[/quote]
I just had no idea wtf he was talking bout tbh. You replied to him so I thought it was 1 player or something lol. Fuckin random.

Read full topic

item.title: [project]Fun Server
item.dc:creator: @ravfe ravfe
item.description:
@ravfe wrote:

[quote=“lol k, post:2, topic:357163”]here is an idea :P, sorta stupid but
for magic dont put levels like you dont need 80 mage to use charge, u need an amount of mana to use the points
and when u use a spell it takes off mana and it refulls it up
and if you level your magic it adds more mana points like
starts off as 1, then you get a level and the man bar goes to 2[/quote]
thats kinda what i was thinking i’d do with the whole mana system, except to add spells for melee and ranged characters too

Read full topic
